name: Stone Raider
description:
Stone raider is a spellcrafting roguelite platformer. Explore procedurally generated rooms until you escape the underground. Fight monsters with your spells. Search for stones which add effects to your magical attacks. Only with clever combinations of your spells will you escape...

The game was made by a team of 4 in one week for the 6AMES MADE QUICK??? game jam.

Controls:

AD - Walk

WS - Climb

W / Space - Jump, Cast Movement Spell

Left Click - Cast Attack Spell

E - Open Inventory

Contributors:

ect

ColdPepperoni
